text: ChIP assays was performed as previously described6 .

The primers used to amplify the promoter region adjacent to the kappaB sites of <extra_id_0> IL8 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> NFKBIA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , as well as <extra_id_0> ACTB <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> have been described6 .
